title: Broccoli Stilton soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoon rapeseed oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '1 stick celery, sliced', '1 leek, sliced', '1 medium potato, diced', '1 knob butter', '1L low salt or homemade chicken or vegetable stock', '1 head broccoli, roughly chopped', '140g Stilton, or other blue cheese, crumbled']
